document_data.name: Hairtooth
document_data.mainbody:
'''Hairtooth''' was an [[ogrillion]] that lived on the [[Sword Coast]] during the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].
{{Quote|Yeah, you smart! We take heads anyway, and get lots gold.|Hairtooth, to his associate Gnarl.}}
document_data.Possesions: He carried with him a powerful set of [[magic]] items, including a pair of ''[[bracers of dexterity]]''.
document_data.Relationships: Hairtooth was a bit more timid, less forceful, and likely a bit less intelligent than his companion [[Gnarl]].
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1368}}, Hairtooth and Gnarl spent their times extorting passers-by as they ventured near the bridge spanning the narrow waterway just east of a [[Gnoll Stronghold|gnoll-controlled stronghold]].
